channel.title: Best way to save?
channel.description:
So I am currently coming up with some ideas on what would be the best to approach my problem.
Lets just call it a quest.
Player needs to complete 3 objectives. A, B and C He must do A first B second and C third in that order.
A simple shit way to do it is to give the player a item that he must use for the next step but I am not looking for that.
So the current idea is to setup a table in the DB which will store players information.
Thoughts or ideas?
